item.title: About
item.description: Wrath & Ruin Brewing Company is located midway between Leeds and York, in a village called Sherburn in Elmet. With a focus on providing innovative craft beer to our customers, we source ingredients locally and ethically to create taste sensations. We are a part time nano-brewery, with big ambitions! Local - As many of our ingredients as possible will be locally sourced – Our Malt is from Thomas Fawcett in Castleford and we are currently building relationships with local farms to source, strawberries, rhubarb, raspberries and gooseberries amongst other things.

item.title: Beers
item.description: The beers we brew will be beers we like to drink, from IPAs to Imperial Stouts to Berliner Weisse style sours. The nature of the market and seasonal ingredients, means that our beers will always be changing. Our one constant, will be our innovation. Ostara Pale Ale with Grapefruit & Orange Zest Hopped with Cascade hops 330ml bottle 5.2% Available from Raynville Superstore 14-16 Raynville Rd, Leeds LS12 2TF 0113 275 2894 http://raynvillesuperstore.

item.title: Brewers
item.description: Simon Head Brewer Simon had to endure being harassed by Mark to try craft beer and eventually caved and tried an IPA. This was the start of a journey, which has seen him get a handle on many different styles of beer – especially Belgian styles on many trips there. Starting home brewing a few years ago Simon quickly found himself in his element and knew this is what he wanted to do for a living.
